data.name: Twin Stick Heroes Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
In his collaboration with the Burnett brothers, German composer Christoph Jakob was brought to the table in order to add the musical accompaniment to their local multiplayer game Twin Stick Heroes.

Drawing inspiration from several other twin stick shooters, as well as Splatoon and Sonic Rush, this release has a strong focus on experimentation. A culmination of catchy synthesizer melodies, rad slap bass lines and hard driving drum beats to keep the players incited.

In addition to being your sonic companion during the game, the music in this album is intended to be enjoyable as a standalone soundtrack for a short and casual listening experience.

The album contains 6 tracks delivered in high quality MP3 (320 kbps) and has a total length of 16 minutes.
